verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> After <S%G1223><s%> Fourteen <S%G1180><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Went Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> Taking With <S%G4838><s%> Me Also <S%G2532><s%> Titus; <S%G5103><s%>

<S%G305><s%> But I Went Up <S%G1161><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Revelation, <S%G602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Laid Before <S%G394><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> But Privately <S%G1161><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Of Repute, <S%G1380><s%> Lest Somehow <S%G3381><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Vain <S%G2756><s%> I Should Be Running <S%G5143><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Had Run; <S%G5143><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> Who Was <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> A Greek <S%G1672><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> Was Compelled <S%G315><s%> To Be Circumcised; <S%G4059><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> And This On Account Of <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brought In Stealthily <S%G3920><s%> False Brethren, <S%G5569><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Came In By Stealth <S%G3922><s%> To Spy Out <S%G2684><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Freedom <S%G1657><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> They Might Bring Into Bondage; <S%G2615><s%>

To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> An Hour <S%G5610><s%> Did We Yield <S%G1502><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Subjection, <S%G5292><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Might Continue <S%G1265><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

From <S%G575><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Reputed <S%G1380><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Something, <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3697><s%> Whatsoever <S%G4218><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Makes Difference : The <S%G1308><s%> Person <S%G4383><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Does Accept; <S%G2983><s%> <S%G1698><s%> For To Me <S%G1063><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of Repute <S%G1380><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Conferred; <S%G4323><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> On The Contrary, <S%G5121><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Have Been Entrusted With <S%G4100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Peter That <S%G4074><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>

He Who <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Wrought <S%G1754><s%> In Peter <S%G4074><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Apostleship <S%G651><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> Wrought <S%G1754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In Me <S%G1698><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Known <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cephas <S%G2786><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Reputed <S%G1380><s%> Pillars <S%G4769><s%> To Be, The <S%G1511><s%> Right Hands <S%G1188><s%> They Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> Of Fellowship, <S%G2842><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Go <S%G2249><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> <S%G846><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Circumcision : <S%G4061><s%>

Only <S%G3440><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Remember, <S%G3421><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Was Diligent <S%G4704><s%> <S%G846><s%> Very Thing <S%G5124><s%> To Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> <S%G2596><s%> To The Face <S%G4383><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> I Withstood, <S%G436><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> To Be Condemned <S%G2607><s%> He Was : <S%G2258><s%>

<S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Before That <S%G1063><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> From <S%G575><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> He Was Eating; <S%G4906><s%> <S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> They Came, <S%G2064><s%> He Was Drawing Back <S%G5288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Separating <S%G873><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> Being Afraid Of <S%G5399><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Circumcision; <S%G4061><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Conjointly Dissembled <S%G4942><s%> With Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Of The Jews, <S%G2453><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> Was Carried Away <S%G4879><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Dissimulation. <S%G5272><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Walk Not Uprightly <S%G3716><s%> According To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> I Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Peter <S%G4074><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou, <S%G4771><s%> A Jew <S%G2453><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> Nation Like <S%G1483><s%> Livest <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Jewishly, <S%G2452><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Dost Thou Compel <S%G315><s%> To Judaize? <S%G2450><s%>
We, <S%G2249><s%> By Nature <S%G5449><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Sinners, <S%G268><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Justified <S%G1344><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of Law, <S%G3551><s%> <S%G1437><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Believed, <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Might Be Justified <S%G1344><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of Law; <S%G3551><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be Justified <S%G1344><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of Law <S%G3551><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> Now If <S%G1161><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> To Be Justified <S%G1344><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> We Were Found <S%G2147><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ourselves <S%G846><s%> Sinners, <S%G268><s%> Is Then <S%G687><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Of Sin <S%G266><s%> Minister? <S%G1249><s%> <S%G3361><s%> May It Not Be! <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I Threw Down <S%G2647><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Build, <S%G3618><s%> A Transgressor <S%G3848><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> I Constitute. <S%G4921><s%>
<S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ Through 1223 PREP Law 3551 N-GSM To Law 3551 N-DSM Died, 599 V-2AAI-1S That 2443 CONJ To God 2316 N-DSM I May Live. 2198 V-AAS-1S

Christ <S%G5547><s%> I Have Been Crucified With, <S%G4957><s%> <S%G2198><s%> Yet I Live, <S%G1161><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> <S%G2198><s%> But Lives <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3739><s%> But That Which <S%G1161><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Live <S%G2198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> I Live, <S%G2198><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave Up <S%G3860><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> I Do Not Set Aside <S%G114><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Righteousness Is, <S%G1343><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> For Nought <S%G1432><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>
